Title: Ride Experience Analyst Intern

Description: YOU’LL BE BASED AT: IBC Knowledge Park, Bengaluru

YOU’LL BE ALIGNED WITH: Senior Product Manager- Ride experience

YOU’LL BE A MEMBER OF: Product Management (Vehicles & Ecosystem)

WHAT YOU’LL DO AT ATHER:

This role is for an intern-analyst who would take care of validating user VoC and test

market

fit for existing and upcoming ride experiences on electric two wheelers and provide PoCs

of

solutions for improving customer experience of these experiences.

? Extensive market research to understand customer feedback and competition

benchmarking of various ride assist features on Ather two wheelers.

? Track data and create dashboards to monitor metrics for usage, quality, visibility and

thus sellability of features.

? Leverage data to classify users and create various user profiles to understand profile

based feature usage behaviour.

? Envision the future of these smart ride experience features to establish a stronger

product market fit.

? Translate product requirements into technical specifications for development by

Engg teams and verify that the requirements have been translated properly.

? Engage in prototype building and work through PoC’s to deliver on improved

experiences.

? Pitch the improved experience to various stakeholders in the company and create

buy-through for prioritization and on-field deployment of these experiences.

? Define and solve problems from first principles.

? Work with hardware, firmware, various domains of data and software engineers.

? Further work with product and senior product managers to envision future ride

experiences of Ather.

HERE’S WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:

? Solid understanding of two wheeler riding

? Solid understanding of IoT systems, user research and data analytics

? Ability to read C code and write SQL scripts.

? Ability to create structured narratives and product pitch documents

? A good team player with interpersonal planning and good communication

skills.

Title: Product Analyst- Intern

Description:

YOU’LL BE BASED AT: IBC Knowledge Park, Bengaluru

YOU’LL BE ALIGNED WITH: Product Line Manager

YOU’LL BE A MEMBER OF: Product Management (Vehicles & Ecosystem)

WHAT YOU’LL DO AT ATHER:

This role is for an intern-analyst who would envision and build PoC’s for future user

experiences for performance/sport two wheelers at Ather.

? Extensive market research across industries to understand needs and wants of

performance/sport users of two wheelers globally.

? Analyse data of sport user based features in Ather vehicles currently and combine

those insights with market research to develop hypothesis for future experiences

? Conduct small scale user researches to validate the hypothesis before putting

across PRD (product requirement document)

? Translate product requirements into technical specifications for development by

Engg teams and verify that the requirements have been translated properly.

? Engage in prototype building and work through PoC’s to deliver on these future

experiences

? Pitch the new experience to various stakeholders in the company and create

buy-through for prioritization and PoC building.

? Build business cases and further work on GTM (Go-to market) of these experiences

and by extension the overall vehicle.

? Define and solve problems from first principles.

? Work with hardware, firmware, various domains of data and software engineers.

HERE’S WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:

? Strong ability to create structured narratives and product pitch documents

? Solid understanding of two wheeler riding and new technologies

? Good understanding of IoT systems, user research and data analytics

? Ability to write SQL scripts.

? A good team player with interpersonal planning and good communication

skills.

Title: Mechanical Engineer- Intern

Description: You’ll be based at IBC Knowledge Park, Bengaluru

You’ll be aligned with- Department of Chief Engineering

You’ll be joining our- Department of Chief Engineering

What you’ll do at Ather

? Work on the building blocks on next generation technology

? Design mechanical parts and assemblies with critical thinking on its impact

throughout the project

? Prototype rapidly and make new mistakes fast

? Iterate designs to move past ‘proof of concept’ phase quickly

Here’s what we’re looking for

? Solid CAD skills

? Mechanical prototyping skills

? Comfortable with designing for (some of the following):

¦ Machining - Turning, milling etc

¦ 3d printing

¦ Laser cutting

¦ Plastics

¦ Adhesives

? Enjoys getting hands dirty with assembling parts

? Is diligent with creating test plans and executing tests

? Math oriented - Makes decisions based on data and avoids thumb rules and

willing to learn when to use which

? Good people skills to be able to coordinate with lots of people to get stuff done

? Good to have NOT AT ALL mandatory:

? Familiarity with thermal engineering and thermal simulations

? Familiarity with embedded hardware such as simple projects on

Arduino/ESP etc

? Familiarity with crunching data with tools other than Excel

What you bring to Ather

? A fresh approach to looking at conventional problems and methodology.

? Ask and answer ‘why not this way’

? A curious mind that can ask the right questions and bring new ideas to the table.

Mechanical Engineer- Intern
